UniprotID	Q9H2B2
Accession	Q9H2B2;B4DEU3;Q9P2K4
EntryName	SYT4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Synaptotagmin-4 (Synaptotagmin IV) (SytIV)
GeneName	SYT4 KIAA1342
Length	425
Function	Synaptotagmin family member which does not bind Ca(2+) (By similarity) (PubMed:23999003). Involved in neuronal dense core vesicles (DCVs) mobility through its interaction with KIF1A. Upon increased neuronal activity, phosphorylation by MAPK8/JNK1 destabilizes the interaction with KIF1A and captures DCVs to synapses (By similarity). Plays a role in dendrite formation by melanocytes (PubMed:23999003).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasmic vesicle; Secretory vesicle; Neuronal dense core vesicle membrane
Disorder	0.3840,0.4220,0.4619,0.3667,0.4256,0.4507,0.3983,0.3529,0.3774,0.3182,0.2399,0.2645,0.2715,0.1554,0.2292,0.1643,0.1206,0.0690,0.0676,0.0433,0.0405,0.0531,0.0275,0.0231,0.0218,0.0133,0.0097,0.0093,0.0125,0.0125,0.0174,0.0300,0.0300,0.0334,0.0605,0.0646,0.0967,0.1323,0.2470,0.2715,0.2503,0.2503,0.2193,0.2680,0.2951,0.3321,0.3460,0.4051,0.4801,0.4087,0.4119,0.3426,0.2715,0.3019,0.3182,0.3392,0.2609,0.2783,0.2680,0.2364,0.2002,0.2715,0.1759,0.2680,0.2951,0.2951,0.3529,0.4087,0.4292,0.4369,0.4330,0.4186,0.5098,0.5992,0.5992,0.5533,0.4725,0.5854,0.5577,0.5807,0.5854,0.5139,0.5296,0.5707,0.5807,0.5254,0.5342,0.5176,0.5296,0.5254,0.4409,0.5176,0.5254,0.5296,0.4256,0.4256,0.4441,0.5098,0.4940,0.4292,0.4119,0.4441,0.5139,0.5055,0.6227,0.6043,0.7036,0.5951,0.6183,0.6322,0.5901,0.6851,0.7036,0.6948,0.5854,0.5901,0.4801,0.4979,0.4940,0.4901,0.5665,0.5854,0.5456,0.4831,0.4864,0.4864,0.5017,0.4940,0.5017,0.4864,0.4685,0.4901,0.4901,0.4582,0.3983,0.4652,0.5758,0.6806,0.6851,0.6755,0.6806,0.7036,0.6851,0.5951,0.6712,0.6806,0.5533,0.4330,0.3356,0.3948,0.3286,0.3460,0.2715,0.2817,0.1881,0.2645,0.2609,0.2575,0.2224,0.1275,0.0948,0.0605,0.0605,0.0380,0.0568,0.0618,0.0518,0.0780,0.1424,0.1611,0.1914,0.2328,0.1942,0.2783,0.2752,0.3910,0.3740,0.3460,0.3599,0.3807,0.4901,0.5951,0.5665,0.4619,0.5419,0.5176,0.5055,0.4476,0.3704,0.3983,0.4901,0.4507,0.4685,0.4979,0.4831,0.4051,0.3840,0.3910,0.4149,0.3460,0.2715,0.2645,0.2258,0.3117,0.3117,0.3249,0.3807,0.3460,0.3182,0.3983,0.3807,0.3704,0.2680,0.2817,0.1759,0.1184,0.1671,0.1115,0.1275,0.0799,0.1206,0.1852,0.1184,0.1298,0.1349,0.1323,0.1092,0.0555,0.0676,0.0662,0.0646,0.0349,0.0209,0.0398,0.0202,0.0389,0.0676,0.0327,0.0555,0.0473,0.0799,0.0780,0.0424,0.0424,0.0398,0.0389,0.0424,0.0306,0.0294,0.0341,0.0405,0.0389,0.0662,0.0631,0.0676,0.0817,0.0780,0.0817,0.1528,0.1528,0.1229,0.0749,0.0605,0.1115,0.1823,0.1942,0.1162,0.1007,0.1554,0.2364,0.2224,0.2399,0.2436,0.2399,0.3249,0.3117,0.3910,0.3983,0.3840,0.3983,0.3149,0.2645,0.2541,0.2849,0.1
